articles.description: The problems are piling up for Liverpool head coach Arne Slot as Manchester United inflict fourth successive loss, reports BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Liverpool manager Arne Slot's problems pile up as blip now becomes deeper

articles.description: Finally, at Anfield, home of Manchester United's - historically and statistically - biggest rivals, Ruben Amorim's team delivered a statement win.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim's big moment - are Man Utd finally ready for lift off?

articles.description: For the first time all year, Max Verstappen says that winning the world championship is a real possibility after his United States Grand Prix victory.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Max Verstappen's 'positive pressure' as he goes 'flat out' for fifth title

articles.description: England's win over India in the Women's World Cup was the most important of the Charlotte Edwards era because of the way they handled pressure, says Ffion Wynne.
articles.title: Women's World Cup 2025: England advance to semis with most important win of Charlotte Edwards era

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Getafe vs Real Madrid in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Getafe vs Real Madrid: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Travis Hunter scores his first NFL touchdown but it is merely a consolation as the Los Angeles Rams brush off jet lag to claim a 35-7 win over the Jacksonville Jaguars at Wembley.
articles.title: NFL London: Los Angeles Rams beat Jacksonville Jaguars 35-7 at Wembley

articles.description: The Israeli Premier League derby between Maccabi Tel Aviv and Hapoel Tel Aviv is cancelled before kick-off and nine people are arrested.
articles.title: Maccabi Tel Aviv v Hapoel Tel Aviv called off by police after disorder

articles.description: BBC Scotland examines what was a day of incident for defending Scottish champions Celtic at Dundee.
articles.title: Bouncy balls, points gaps & Honda Civics - how Celtic's chaotic day at Dundee unfolded

articles.description: Tommy Fleetwood shares a touching moment with his son Frankie after winning the DP World India Championship by two shots.
articles.title: DP World Tour: Tommy Fleetwood wins in India to answer son's dreams

articles.description: Rangers' bid to make Kevin Muscat their new head coach has broken down after advanced talks.
articles.title: Kevin Muscat deal to be new Rangers boss off
